name: Asteroid Fury
description:
Take control, power-up and get ready for some defence!

- Simple Controls, hard to master
- Earn Credits
- Upgrade power-ups
- Aim for a High Score
- Have fun!

Please leave a comment if you enjoyed the game or wanted to provide feedback!

Enjoy!

Controls: 

  1. Left Arrow Key to rotate the paddle to the left
  2. Right Arrow Key to rotate paddle to the right.
